Traits.Name: Latch
Traits.Description: Starts combat sharing the same space as another ally the same size or larger (can be targeted separately), reducing the apeâ€™s speed to 0 but moving when its mount moves. Knocked off the ape or mount is shoved away. Can latch on to a new allied character in range 3 with 1 action, teleporting to its space.

Actions.Name: Spur
Actions.Description: The character the Ruin Ape is latched on to dashes 4 in a direction of the Ape's choice and can make an attack that takes 1 action or less as an interrupt.
